Texts.Chs: 把^orange;蒸馏酒精^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;spirits^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 干得好！现在让我们来学习最后一项知识吧！
Texts.Eng: Nice work! Now, we'll have one last recipe to do.

Texts.Chs: 那么*嗝*你可以把这些捣碎的水果做一些^green;美酒^white;。除了这些水果外，你会额外需要一些糖和^orange;酵母水^white;还有^orange;水^white;。然后把所有材料统统放到^green;蒸馏器^white;里，然后就耐心等待吧！*嗝*
Texts.Eng: So *hic* with all these mashed fruits we're ready to make some ^green;shpirits^white;. You'll need some ^orange;yeast water^white; and ^orange;water^white; too. Bring all to the ^green;distiller^white; and do yer magic! *hic*
